text: Thomas Kenneth Bayley (25 June 1921 – 1996) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper. He made appearances in the English Football League for Wrexham and also played for Darlaston Town. Bayley also guested for Walsall during the Second World War. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1996 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Walsall F.C. wartime guest players Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Darlaston Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Sportspeople from Wednesbury
title: Tom Bayley (footballer, born 1921)
